description: Dates at fortnightly intervals starting on Jan 01 of a leap year.
links: Index entries for sequences related to calendars
mathematica: (* first do *) Needs["Calendar`"] (* then *) Table[ DaysPlus[{4, 1, 1}, 14 n][[3]], {n, 0, 76}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Apr 18 2010 *)
author: Karen Richardson (s1149414(AT)cedarville.edu)
